item.title: Using a Poetry environment in Visual Studio Code's Python Interactive window
item.description: tl;dr â€“ If you manage your project dependencies with Poetry, develop in Visual Studio (VS) Code, and use VS Code’s Python interactive window, you can use the poetry-monorepo extension to select your project’s poetry environment as the interactive kernel. What is poetry? Poetry is a slick package builder and dependency manager for python projects. It helps project contributors specify and setup their Python environment. Say you are working on a python project and need to incorporate a non-standard library, such as pandas.
